 Source file name.

Detailed Description

This class is implemented in a kludge manner so that the interface for get_bucket_iters is the same as that for ModelSitemaps. We don't really care about speed penalty here as it is not production code

Member Function Documentation

bool SimSite3D::AllPairsSitemapTest::get_bucket_iters ( const uint  c,
const my_float_t  perimeter,
const my_float_t  max_len,
const my_float_t  min_len,
bucket_vci *  bucket_begin,
bucket_vci *  bucket_end 
) [inline, virtual]

Given c,p,l,s get the iterators for the corresponding color bucket.

Given a "color", get all the triangles with that color via iterators to the begin and end of the bucket.

Parameters:
c hash_class index
p perimeter level index -- not used in this class
l longest edge length index -- not used in this class
s shortest edge length index -- not used in this class
bucket_begin Pointer to the beginning of the bucket
bucket_end Pointer to the end of the bucket
Returns:
true if bucket is nonempty

Reimplemented from SimSite3D::ModelSitemap.
